short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download apps with a qr code from main app stores: apple, android, windows, amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download apps with a qr code from main app stores: apple, android, windows, amazon.

How to use this extension?
1- Go to app profile in any appstore
2- Scan the QR
3- Download the app
